name: Little Mother
description:
Little Mother

The primal fear of the unknown.

Venture deeper and deeper into the bowels of the earth to uncover the secret of your family's disappearance. Where have they gone?
What holds power over them? What does he want from you?

Warning! On some browsers sound might glitch, so we'd advise opening the game in Firefox, or downloading the game.

Controls:
Press Space to start the game
Move: W A S D
Interact: Space

Special controls for the non-browser version:
Toggle fullscreen: F11
Exit game: Escape

Made with Godot for the 48th Ludum Dare game jam (2021)Kornelille & Almam
